seo_content:
Exclusive Alpha Capital Trading Offer

Alpha Capital, based in the United Kingdom, was established in November 2021. It operates as a CFD firm and offers 1 Step, 2 Steps, and 3 Steps programs. Account sizes range from $25,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, cTrader, DXTrade, and TradeLocker. Tradable instruments include forex, commodities, and indices, with leverage options up to 100:1. The firm has a review score of 4.4/5 based on 811 reviews. Overall, Alpha Capital presents multiple program step options, several platform choices, and a range of instruments and leverage levels. certified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Alpha Capital Promo Code: Check website Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with Alpha Capital using our exclusive discount code. confirmed for the current trading season.
